summary: Comprehensive testing of Astrology module for My Dammaiguda platform. Backend APIs (15 tests) all passed. Frontend features (Kundali, Marriage Compatibility, Zodiac Horoscope) all working correctly. Fixed missing Select component import in Astrology.jsx.

fixed_bugs.issue: Select component was used but not imported - caused runtime error
fixed_bugs.fix: Added missing import: Select, SelectContent, SelectItem, SelectTrigger, SelectValue from '../components/ui/select'

passed_tests: Backend: Kundali generation with valid data - PASS (15/15 tests)
Backend: Free-text city input works correctly - PASS
Backend: Unknown city defaults to Hyderabad coordinates - PASS
Backend: Dammaiguda city coordinates resolved - PASS
Backend: 9 planetary positions returned - PASS
Backend: 12 houses for South Indian chart - PASS
Backend: Vimshottari Dasha periods calculated - PASS
Backend: Nakshatra and Moon sign calculated - PASS
Backend: Cities/Rashis/Nakshatras helper endpoints - PASS
Frontend: Astrology main page loads with 3 option cards - PASS
Frontend: Kundali form with name, gender, DOB, time, city (free-text) - PASS
Frontend: Kundali generates with Chart, Planets, Predictions tabs - PASS
Frontend: South Indian Rasi Chart displays correctly - PASS
Frontend: Life predictions (Career, Finance, Health, Personal, Marriage) visible - PASS
Frontend: Marriage Compatibility uses Boy/Girl labels - PASS
Frontend: Kundali Milan / Guna Matching reference visible - PASS
Frontend: Zodiac Horoscope shows all 12 signs - PASS
Frontend: Daily/Weekly/Monthly period selectors work - PASS
Frontend: Horoscope predictions (Love, Career, Health, Money) visible - PASS
Frontend: Lucky Number and Lucky Color displayed - PASS
critical_code_review_comments: Astrology.jsx was missing Select component import - FIXED
City input changed from dropdown to free-text as specified - VERIFIED
Marriage Compatibility uses Boy/Girl labels (not Person 1/2) - VERIFIED
Backend API /api/astrology/kundali accepts free-text city and defaults to Hyderabad for unknown cities
Zodiac horoscope predictions are template-based (not AI-generated) - acceptable as per requirements
seed_data_creation: No seed data required - Kundali is generated dynamically from birth details
context_for_next_testing_agent: Astrology module fully tested and working. Three main features: 1) Kundali generation with South Indian chart, planetary positions, Dasha periods, and life predictions; 2) Marriage Compatibility with Boy/Girl form labels and Guna matching; 3) Zodiac Horoscope with 12 signs and daily/weekly/monthly predictions. City input is free-text (not dropdown). OTP authentication uses static 123456.

zodiac_horoscope.signs: All 12 zodiac signs displayed in grid
zodiac_horoscope.predictions: Love, Career, Health, Money categories with Lucky Number/Color
